name: Berachain Mainnet Default Reward Vault List

categories.name: GameFi
categories.description: GameFi is a category of blockchain-based games that combine elements of traditional gaming with blockchain technology.

protocols.name: HUB
protocols.description: Swap a variety of tokens effortlessly on our decentralized platform. Provide liquidity to pools and earn BGT rewards.

protocols.name: Concrete
protocols.description: Concrete is the DeFi Liquidity Metalayer

protocols.name: WeBera
protocols.description: WeBera is a permissionless yield abstraction layer designed to simplify participation in DeFi on the Berachain ecosystem.

protocols.name: BurrBear
protocols.description: BurrBear is a decentralized exchange and DeFi protocol on Berachain.

protocols.name: Kodiak
protocols.description: Kodiak is a decentralized exchange for the Berachain ecosystem.

protocols.name: Yeet
protocols.description: GigaBonzi

protocols.name: Infrared Finance
protocols.description: Infrared Finance is a DeFi protocol focused on innovative yield strategies and liquidity solutions.

protocols.name: Dolomite
protocols.description: Dolomite is a decentralized money market protocol.

protocols.name: D2 Finance
protocols.description: D2 Finance is a multi-strategy fund delivering tokenized derivatives strategies and derivatives trading, in a 100% on-chain solution.

protocols.name: Beraborrow
protocols.description: Beraborrow unlocks instant liquidity against Berachain assets through the first PoL powered stablecoin, Nectar

protocols.name: Beradrome
protocols.description: Beradrome is a decentralized exchange and liquidity protocol on Berachain.

protocols.name: Bulla Exchange
protocols.description: Bulla Exchange is a decentralized trading platform on Berachain.

protocols.name: Wasabi
protocols.description: Wasabi is a spot leverage DEX that allows you to long, short, swap, and earn on your favorite tokens.

protocols.name: Kuma
protocols.description: Kuma is a layer 2 perpetual futures DEX powered by Berachain's Proof-of-Liquidity.

protocols.name: D8X
protocols.description: D8X powers leveraged trading for the Berachain Ecosystem on DEXs like MadHoney.fi

protocols.name: bro.trade
protocols.description: bro.trade is a community-driven, decentralized cryptocurrency trading platform specializing in perpetual futures (perps).

protocols.name: Wasabee
protocols.description: Wasabee is a meme DEX for the Berachain ecosystem

protocols.name: Euler
protocols.description: Euler is a decentralized lending protocol.

protocols.name: Beratardio
protocols.description: Extra retarded (maybe sentient) bear smoking weed & buzzing off Mad Honey. First memecoin to graduate from @KodiakFi's Panda Factory.

protocols.name: IVX Finance
protocols.description: IVX is a liquid options AMM built on top of Berachain network that allow users to trade zero days to expiry option contracts over a variety of assets.

protocols.name: Lode Trade
protocols.description: LODE is a decentralized trading platform that aggregates liquidity from both centralized and decentralized exchanges, offering deep liquidity, minimal slippage, and innovative risk management.

protocols.name: Wizzwoods
protocols.description: 1st pixel farm game integrates interchain capabilities with a SocialFi twist.

protocols.name: OpenState
protocols.description: Openstate enables scalable yield infrastructure. Earn top yields and enjoy instant liquidity for BGT and more - all on Openstate.

protocols.name: Bearn
protocols.description: BGT liquid locker and autocompounder

protocols.name: Bedrock
protocols.description: Bedrock is the first multi-asset liquid restaking protocol, pioneering Bitcoin staking with uniBTC.

protocols.name: ZeroLend
protocols.description: ZeroLend is lending platform to lend/borrow medium and long-tail assets.

protocols.name: GetRichQuick
protocols.description: A parody-powered financial experiment designed for degens, dreamers, and anyone who's ever ignored a "DYOR" warning.

protocols.name: BULL ISH
protocols.description: Bull Ish is a Proof of Liquidity game where users spend BERA to 'spank a bera,' placing them in a queue to earn BGT while depositing the square root of their spank power into the Berachain vault.

protocols.name: BeraPaw
protocols.description: BeraPaw is an innovative liquid staking protocol that converts Berachain's native token into a more versatile and liquid asset, providing users with a seamless and hassle-free experience.

protocols.name: SX Bet
protocols.description: On-chain sports betting exchange

protocols.name: Ether.fi
protocols.description: Save, grow, spend.

protocols.name: Solv Protocol
protocols.description: Solv Protocol is a platform that offers a comprehensive set of financial services for Bitcoin holders, including lending, liquid staking, yield generation, and fund management. Powered by a large on-chain Bitcoin reserve, Solv unlocks the potential of Bitcoin's $1 trillion market.

protocols.name: Beramonium
protocols.description: Beramonium is an idle-RPG & economic strategy game on Berachain

protocols.name: HoneyFun AI
protocols.description: We're bringing virtuals to Berachain. Create your memecoin/AI Agent in few clicks.

protocols.name: Roots
protocols.description: Roots is a Berachain-native decentralized lending protocol that optimizes for capital efficiency by allowing users to mint its stablecoin MEAD against yield-generating assets, offering no-interest loans, minimal fees, and the ability to pursue additional DeFi opportunities while retaining their underlying APR.

protocols.name: TWIN Finance
protocols.description: TWIN Finance is a synthetic assets protocol for derivatives of real-world assets on Berachain

protocols.name: Aquabera
protocols.description: Liquidity management protocol that maximizes your returns while minimizing risks without requiring constant oversight.

protocols.name: Plutus
protocols.description: Liquidity, Yield, and Stability — chains simplified. Parent protocol for Orange Finance, Berancia, Deep Thought, and LPfun. Plutus provides delta neutral yield strategies, simple interfaces for advanced strategies, and a berachain native algorithmic stable coin plsHONEY

protocols.name: HENLO
protocols.description: HENLO is a memecoin built by 0xHoneyJar, designed for deep integration into Berachain PoL and DeFi ecosystem.

protocols.name: Origami Finance
protocols.description: Origami Finance offers automated DeFi strategies and yield optimization on Berachain.

protocols.name: Berabaddies Content Protocol
protocols.description: Berabaddies Content Protocol is a platform for incentivizing and managing content creation in the Berachain ecosystem.

protocols.name: GOING to ZERO
protocols.description: GOING to ZERO is a DeFi protocol focused on experimental tokenomics and community-driven incentives.

protocols.name: Ultraviolet
protocols.description: Ultraviolet is a Berachain-native protocol for innovative DeFi products and liquidity strategies.

protocols.name: fatBERA
protocols.description: fatBERA is a liquid staking token and yield product in the Berachain ecosystem.

protocols.name: Eden
protocols.description: The Gachapon proxy contract [0x73C7677A8bC73178aE36aD97C984df79E99A18CE] holds 100% of the staking token, which is only a placeholder token.

protocols.name: Apiology DAO
protocols.description: The staking token is a treasury-held position; no external users can acquire it. Governance seat ownership is decentralized across 1,930 addresses, with no address controlling more than 20% of the seats. Seat holders can be viewed here: https://dune.com/thj/apiologydao

protocols.name: Paddle Finance
protocols.description: Paddle Finance is a decentralized money market protocol on Berachain, enabling lending and borrowing of digital assets.

protocols.name: Kettle
protocols.description: Kettle is a DeFi protocol on Berachain focused on innovative yield and liquidity strategies.

protocols.name: Stream Protocol
protocols.description: Stream Protocol is a decentralized platform for streaming payments and programmable money on Berachain.

protocols.name: Lair Finance
protocols.description: Lair Finance is a DeFi protocol for liquidity management and yield optimization on Berachain.

protocols.name: beraBTC
protocols.description: beraBTC is a wrapped Bitcoin token and liquidity product on Berachain.

protocols.name: Jiko
protocols.description: A yield optimizer protocol powering the PvP idle card game.

protocols.name: Frax Finance
protocols.description: Frax Finance is a decentralized stablecoin and DeFi platform, offering the FRAX stablecoin and related products.

protocols.name: Ooga Booga
protocols.description: Ooga Booga is a meme and DeFi protocol on Berachain, focused on community-driven incentives and fun.

protocols.name: Honeypot Finance
protocols.description: All-in-one Vault [0x9c52cD80455a9ee50610aC90e846e46E04014f6d] holds 100% of the staking token as the placeholder token.

protocols.name: BakerDAO
protocols.description: The staking token is a dummy ERC-20 owned wholly by the BakerDAO multisig, where rewards earned are distributed to BakerDAO users with active loans and loops initiated after the snapshot block (block 5623025). Although it is technically owned wholly by BakerDAO, the true beneficial ownership will be decentralized, with protocol users owning the shares. Since only users who open debt positions after snapshot will be beneficial owners, there are none as of yet

protocols.name: Quod In Altum
protocols.description: The staking token is 100% controlled by BeraPaw's Proof of Liquidity Strategy Contract, where rewards will be used to buyback QIA and burn it, rewarding all holders in the process. Instead here is a list of QIA big holders addresses.

protocols.name: Stargate Finance
protocols.description: Stargate Finance is a cross-chain liquidity transfer protocol that enables seamless token transfers between different blockchains.

protocols.name: Golidilocks: Defi DAO (AMM, Yield Tokenisation platform and NFT lending), Origami (automated defi strategies) and Steer (automated liquidity manager)
protocols.description: Almost all supply currently in Beradrome farm.

protocols.name: SatLayer
protocols.description: SatLayer is the economic layer for Bitcoin, making the best asset now fully programmable.

protocols.name: Sumer
protocols.description: Sumer is a liquidity infrastructure that combines lending, synthetic assets and cross chain liquidity into one unified pool to maximize capital efficiency.

vaults.name: LXP Rewards Vault
vaults.description: LXP is acquired by using LODE (i.e. trading and completing quest campaigns). LXP is a proxy for trading rebates and rewards, it does not have liquidity nor is intended to be traded. LXP must be claimed and staked in our rewards vault (https://hub.berachain.com/vaults/0x127696d2e3a4ea1f4eed1afef608e8901cbe8965/) to be eligible for rewards. Please review our full proposal here: https://hub.forum.berachain.com/t/request-for-lxp-reward-vault-lode/316.

vaults.name: BakerDAO Bread Borrowing
vaults.description: The staking token is a dummy ERC-20 owned wholly by the BakerDAO multisig, where rewards earned are distributed to BakerDAO users with active loans and loops initiated after the snapshot block (block 5623025). Although it is technically owned wholly by BakerDAO, the true beneficial ownership will be decentralized, with protocol users owning the shares. Since only users who open debt positions after snapshot will be beneficial owners, there are none as of yet

vaults.name: JIKO BET
vaults.description: Acquired by spending at least 5 HONEY in-game each day to qualify for that day’s BGT rewards. Eligible spending includes creating rooms, joining rooms, or predicting battles. Once the daily minimum is met, your total spend is converted into LP and auto-staked into the reward vault for BGT distribution.
